summary: REQ-55 is not verifiably implemented as specified (moving exactly the four XPath-identified elements as a consecutive group to the end of their current parent while leaving everything else unchanged). The diff indicates multiple unrelated changes across styling/config/components (and likely layout/behavior), which conflicts with the constraint/AC that nothing outside the selected elements be moved/restyled/changed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Move the four selected elements (exact XPaths given) so they appear together as the last content within their current parent container, preserving their internal order and without changing any other parts of the page.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show any explicit, targeted movement of the four XPath-specified nodes as a group within the same parent; instead it shows broader page/layout/styling updates (e.g., new share-link shell behavior and extensive CSS/Tailwind changes), which violates the requirement’s constraint/AC that no other content be moved/restyled/changed.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced extensive global styling/theme changes and new share-link-shell styling (including fixed positioning, animations, decorations, backdrop blur, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-55 only asked to reposition four specific existing elements and explicitly constrained changes to only those elements without modifying unrelated layout/styling. The diff summary indicates broad CSS additions unrelated to moving nodes.

hallucinated_features.description: Extended Tailwind configuration with many new animations/keyframes and a safelist.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-55; requirement was purely DOM reordering for four specified elements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded entrance overlay visuals/behavior (hearts/sparkles layers, star sparkle layer, reduced-motion behaviors) beyond simple repositioning work.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-55 and falls under ‘Do not redesign or change functionality’ for the entrance overlay.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified/expanded Share Link section content and behavior (publishing guidance notice, troubleshooting hints, custom URL configuration with validation/localStorage).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-55 and conflicts with the non-goal of not changing functionality of the Share Link section.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed PolaroidCollageGallery behavior/content (exactly three images, different images, new decorations and fallback handling).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-55 and conflicts with the non-goal of not redesigning/changing functionality of the gallery.
